update PRODUCT_INFO
CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
